atm

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • atm.Session

  • public class Session
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation for one ATM session serving a single customer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ATM atm
      The ATM on which the session is performed
      private static int CHOOSING_TRANSACTION_STATE
      Asking the customer to choose a transaction type
      private static int EJECTING_CARD_STATE
      Ejecting the customer's card
      private static int FINAL_STATE
      Session finished
      private static int PERFORMING_TRANSACTION_STATE
      Peforming a transaction
      private int pin
      The PIN entered (or re-entered) by the customer
      private static int READING_CARD_STATE
      Reading the customer's card
      private static int READING_PIN_STATE
      Asking the customer to enter a PIN
      private int state
      The current state of the session
